subject: TONIGHT ON SHOWBIZ TONIGHT- CNN HEADLINE PRIME 11pm ET/ 11pm PT
body:
CNN.com - Showbiz Tonight










TONIGHT ON SHOWBIZ TONIGHT- CNN HEADLINE PRIME 11pm ET/ 11pm PT

DON IMUS GETS FIRED -- AND EVERYONE IS FIRED UP!
Explosive fallout from the news that Don Imus has lost his
television show and now his radio show too, because of his
racist and sexist comments. Does the punishment fit the crime?
Showbiz Tonight gathers an extraordinary panel to weigh in on
the controversy that touches on everything from race to gender
to free speech!

ANNA NICOLE SMITH'S SECRET DIARIES
Inside Anna's secret diaries. Howard K. Stern says they're
stolen property, but the sale will go on. Tonight, the man
who's selling Anna's diaries, in the interview you will see
only on Showbiz Tonight! 

ON SHOWBIZ TONIGHT THIS
WEEKEND:
Should we be worried about Howard K. Stern? Why
some say Stern should be put on suicide watch. That's on
Showbiz Tonight This Weekend, Saturday and Sunday at 11 p.m.
ET/PT on CNN Headline Prime.

SHOWBIZ TONIGHT QUESTION
OF THE DAY: 
Imus gets canned: Do you feel sorry for him?
VOTE AT CNN.COM/SHOWBIZ TONIGHT. 

SEND US A VIDEO
EMAIL! 
Send your response to the Question Of The Day on
video. Look into your camera and tell us what you think.
Responses must be no longer than 30 seconds. To send your video
email, go to cnn.com/showbiztonight.Watch your video responses
on "Showbiz Tonight" at 11 p.m. ET/PT on CNN Headline Prime.
